name: 國際組織管理人才發展專題研究
description: 隨者經貿全球一體化之國際環境激烈變遷，台灣已於2002年1月1日加入世界貿易組織。然而，台灣對於國際性經貿組織多未能深入且長期之了解。本課程之教學目標係培養研究生深入了解全球性之國際經貿組織，例如：聯合國(UN)、聯合國貿易暨發展會議(UNCTAD) 、國際電信聯盟 (ITU) 、世界銀行 (WB) 、國際貨幣基金組織 (IMF)、七大工業國 (G-7) 、國際標準組織 (ISO) 、世界糧農組織 (FAO)、國際農業發展基金 (IFAD) 、世界關務組織 (WCO) 、世界智慧財產權組織 (WIPO)。已開拓我國參與國際經貿組織之外交及國際經貿空間。
goals: 培養研究生深入了解全球性之國際經貿組織
syllabus:
1\. **Course Schedule: 16+2 weeks**

2\. Week 17th: Self-directed learning, the learners are requested to read the reading materials and write reports during the class hours.

3\. Week 18th: Self-directed learning, the learners should complete the report writing during the class hours, and upload/ submit it before the due day.

**Objectives:**

The issues of human resource management on international organization, especially focus on management development issues: the latest practices and research trends in the field. There are three primary objectives for this course:

1\. to provide students with an overview of definition and situation of international organizations.

2\. to provide opportunities for students to meet one-on-one with invited scholars and experts.

3\. to provide opportunities for students to learn the

\-current research that is being done in the fields of management development of international organizations, and

\-important issues and different trends

\-necessary information about this field

\-the development of a research topic

          -writing a critical review

**Presentation: about 20 minutes every time when it is needed**

Purpose- exercising article writing

Topic- related to research interest in IHRD field, especially close to thesis topic

Structure example- _referring to Thesis Manual of IHRD for writing style_

_INTRODUCTION_

_Background of the topic_

_Purposes of the topic_

_Significance of this article_

_LITERATURE REVIEW_

_Title setting as it’s necessary_

_RESEARCH DESIGN_

_Method, Target/objective/participant_

_Instrumentation, Data collecting and analysis_

_Validity and reliability_

_Et al._

_FINDINGS/RESULTS_

_Title setting as it’s necessary_

_CONCLUSIONS AND SUGGESTIONS_

_REFERENCES_

Other requirement- presenting with PPT file as possible

               -handing in this paper after presenting and correcting, before final review

**Evaluation:** Total course points-- 100

Participation, discussion, and interaction: 20

Oral presentation: 40

   _\-logic structure 10_

   _-appropriate literature review 10_

   _-communicating skills 20_

Paper reports: 40

   _-understandability of writing 20_

   _-writing style 20_
